mapper.select: SELECT record_id as recordId, vehicle_id as vehicleId, fuel_date as fuelDate, odometer as odoMeter, price_per_liter as pricePerLiter, liters, total_price as totalPrice, memo, created_at as createdAt, updated_at as updatedAt FROM FUEL_RECORD WHERE vehicle_id = #{vehicleId} ORDER BY fuel_date DESC
